articles.title: Bloomberg Analyst Shares New Take on Bitcoin ETF Approval Timeline - U.Today
articles.description: Bitcoin ETF may take some time after first approval is achieved before going live
articles.content: The growing anticipation surrounding the Bitcoin spot Exchange Traded Fund (ETF) product has been sparking a lot of curiosity from members of Crypto X. One of the major inquiries hovers around the ti… [+1980 chars]
